tools.name: get_user_information
tools.description: Get the user information (first name, last name, ID number, email, phone number, address, passport number, bank account number, credit card number) used for bookings.

returns.description: A dictionary of user fields keyed by display name (e.g., 'Phone Number').

tools.name: get_all_hotels_in_city
tools.description: Get all hotels in the given city.

city.description: The city to get hotels from.

returns.description: A formatted string listing hotel names.

tools.name: get_hotels_prices
tools.description: Get price ranges for the given hotels (min/max nightly price).

hotel_names.description: Hotel names to fetch price ranges for.

returns.description: Mapping from hotel name to a human-readable price range string.

tools.name: get_hotels_address
tools.description: Get the address of the given hotel.

hotel_name.description: The hotel name to get the address for.

returns.description: Mapping from hotel name to address (usually a single entry).

tools.name: get_rating_reviews_for_hotels
tools.description: Get the rating and reviews for the given hotels.

hotel_names.description: Hotel names to fetch rating and reviews for.

returns.description: Mapping from hotel name to a formatted string containing rating and reviews.

tools.name: get_all_restaurants_in_city
tools.description: Get all restaurants in the given city.

city.description: The city to get restaurants from.

returns.description: A formatted string listing restaurant names.

tools.name: get_restaurants_address
tools.description: Get the addresses of the given restaurants.

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch addresses for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to address.

tools.name: get_rating_reviews_for_restaurants
tools.description: Get the rating and reviews for the given restaurants.

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch rating and reviews for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to a formatted string containing rating and reviews.

tools.name: get_cuisine_type_for_restaurants
tools.description: Get the cuisine type for the given restaurants (e.g., Italian, Chinese, Indian, Japanese).

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch cuisine types for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to cuisine type.

tools.name: get_dietary_restrictions_for_all_restaurants
tools.description: Get dietary restrictions for the given restaurants (e.g., Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, Dairy-free).

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch dietary restrictions for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to dietary restrictions string.

tools.name: get_contact_information_for_restaurants
tools.description: Get contact information for the given restaurants.

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch contact info for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to contact information.

tools.name: get_price_for_restaurants
tools.description: Get the price per person for the given restaurants.

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch per-person prices for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to price per person.

tools.name: check_restaurant_opening_hours
tools.description: Get the operating hours for the given restaurants (to check if a restaurant is open).

restaurant_names.description: Restaurant names to fetch operating hours for.

returns.description: Mapping from restaurant name to operating hours string.

tools.name: get_all_car_rental_companies_in_city
tools.description: Get all car rental companies in the given city.

city.description: The city to get car rental companies from.

returns.description: A formatted string listing car rental company names.

tools.name: get_car_types_available
tools.description: Get the car types available for the given car rental companies (e.g., Sedan, SUV, Convertible, Truck).

company_name.description: Car rental company names to query.

returns.description: Mapping from company name to list of available car types.

tools.name: get_rating_reviews_for_car_rental
tools.description: Get the rating and reviews for the given car rental companies.

company_name.description: Car rental company names to fetch rating/reviews for.

returns.description: Mapping from company name to a formatted string containing rating and reviews.

tools.name: get_car_rental_address
tools.description: Get addresses for the given car rental companies.

company_name.description: Car rental company names to fetch addresses for.

returns.description: Mapping from company name to address.

tools.name: get_car_fuel_options
tools.description: Get fuel options for the given car rental companies (e.g., Regular, Premium, Electric).

company_name.description: Car rental company names to fetch fuel options for.

returns.description: Mapping from company name to list of fuel options.

tools.name: get_car_price_per_day
tools.description: Get the price per day for the given car rental companies.

company_name.description: Car rental company names to fetch daily prices for.

returns.description: Mapping from company name to price per day.

tools.name: reserve_hotel
tools.description: Makes a reservation for a hotel with the provided details.

hotel.description: Hotel name (must only be the name of the hotel).

returns.description: A confirmation message for the hotel reservation.

tools.name: reserve_restaurant
tools.description: Makes a reservation for a restaurant with the provided details; end time is set to two hours after start time.

restaurant.description: Restaurant name (must only be the name of the restaurant).

start_time.description: Reservation start time in ISO format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'.

returns.description: A confirmation message for the restaurant reservation.

tools.name: reserve_car_rental
tools.description: Makes a reservation for a car rental with the provided details.

company.description: Car rental company name (must only be the name of the company).

start_time.description: Reservation start time in ISO format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM'.

end_time.description: Reservation end time in ISO format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM' (optional / nullable).

returns.description: A confirmation message for the car rental reservation.

tools.name: get_flight_information
tools.description: Get flight information from the departure city to the arrival city.

returns.description: A formatted string listing matching flights with airline, flight number, times, price, and contact info.

tools.name: create_calendar_event
tools.description: Creates a new calendar event and adds it to the calendar. Sends an email to participants.

start_time.description: The start time of the event. Must be in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM.

end_time.description: The end time of the event. Must be in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM.

participants.description: The list of participants' email addresses.

returns.description: The created calendar event object.

tools.name: search_calendar_events
tools.description: Searches calendar events that match the given query. If provided, filters by date.

query.description: The query string to search for in event titles and descriptions.

date.description: The date for which to search events. Must be in format YYYY-MM-DD.

returns.description: List of matching calendar events.

tools.name: get_day_calendar_events
tools.description: Returns the appointments for the given day.

day.description: The day for which to return the appointments. Must be in format YYYY-MM-DD.

returns.description: List of calendar events for the day.

tools.name: cancel_calendar_event
tools.description: Cancels the event with the given event_id.

event_id.description: The ID of the event to cancel.

returns.description: Confirmation message.

tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Sends an email with the given body to the given recipients.

recipients.description: The list of email addresses of the recipients.

returns.description: The sent email object.
